entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException when trying to create an algorithm instance (Aes.Create) in Blazor #60897
  • net6.0-android app crashes in release mode when instantiating HttpClient #60896
  • Share RegexInterpreter.FindFirstChar logic with SymbolicRegexMatcher #60885
    7.0.0
  • Port PackageValidation flaky build failure fixes to 6.0 #60883
  • IBinaryNumber interface does not have an "AllBitsSet" property #60882
    7.0.0
  • PlatformNotSupportedException - On Windows while using the `.UseWindowsService()` #60875
  • Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #60870
    7.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of MemoryExtensions.IndexOf(..., span) #60866
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Tests.TranscodingStreamTests.ReadAsync_Memory(bufferLength: 1) failing in CI #60865
  • Resolve differences between string.IndexOfAny and MemoryExtensions.IndexOfAny #60864
    7.0.0
  • WebAssembly <NativeFileReference> isn't included in VS's fast up-to-date check #60862
  • [API Proposal]: IWritableOptionsMonitor #60858
  • SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync() begin fire TimeoutException on TaskScheduler.UnobservedTaskException in net6.0? #60856
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_RandomAccess #60869
  • .NET 6 C++/CLI runtime generates InvalidProgramException when large stack-allocated variables are used #60852
  • Issues with manipulating filesystem entries that are symlinks #60851
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\GCBench\\gcbench\\gcbench.cmd #60850
  • Test failure SelfContained_NetCoreApp3_CompatMode_SingleFile_APITests #60849

Closed

  • Test failure Color.RedirectedOutputDoesNotUseAnsiSequences #60819
    7.0.0
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero. #57815
    7.0.0
  • Stack<T> should implement IReadOnlyList<T> #29915
    Future
  • Build for System.Runtime fails within VS #40159
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect date format in Windows 10 and Windows 11 #60845
    7.0.0
  • Unhandled exception in Interop.Sys.AllocNullTerminatedArray while starting a process #44034
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: CancellationTokenRegistration.OnUnregisteredWithoutInvoke(Action) #60843
  • QuicConnection.AcceptStreamAsync throws incorrect exception on browser close #60133
    6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Should QuicConnection.Dispose abort? #60235
    7.0.0
  • Libraries packaging should support including roslyn generated documentation xml file #54761
    7.0.0
  • Add a pairing heap to System.Collections.Specialized #28708
    Future
  • API review for QUIC APIs #48686
    7.0.0
  • Consider collapsing libraries reference and source projects #37961
    7.0.0
  • 'The "Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility.ValidatePackage" task failed unexpectedly' in libs legs #59908
    7.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions (5.0.0) #46584
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting solution file does not build properly in VS #50246
    7.0.0
  • Json.Serialization.Converters.DictionaryDefaultConverter ignores custom converters for Enum keys. #60079
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging solution can't be built from Visual Studio #54740
    Future
  • "9009" exit code error #57029
    Future
  • Onboarding work for .NET 7 #57587
    7.0.0
  • ILLinkTrimAssembly condition applies to NetCoreAppCurrent only #58343
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix some typos in corhdr.h #60895
    community-contribution
  • Fix Equals overload logic for some methods of an array created using MLC #60894
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [mono][workloads] Workload 7.0.100 #60893
    area-System.Net
  • Fix a thread local test #60892
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fix UnobservedTaskException from SemaphoreSlim.WaitAsync #60890
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 7.0.0
  • Add configureonly option to host native build #60889
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use IndexOf(..., span) in Regex FindFirstChar #60888
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • release/6.0.1: Preserve last error in call-counting stubs #60887
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JIT: refactor jump threading to prepare for allowing side effects #60884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable package validation in source-build for reliability #60881
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • Change OperIsBlkOp test to check for store block operators #60878
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Extract various changes from the invoke and custom marshaler PRs #60877
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm
  • Allow for multiple copies of the same ModuleId to be found in iteration #60874
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging blazor app after ts changes. #60873
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fixes Broken Link to .NET Forums #60867
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix for #60340 #60863
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60861
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-mono, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.1
  • Fix time-of-use vs. time-of-check "bugs" #60860
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer assemblies to code coverage #60859
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60854

Merged

  • Fix libs.tests build with gcc #60757
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Preserve last error in call-counting stubs #60886
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • SizeConst of MarshalAs(ByValTStr) loaded by MetadataLoadContext always returns zero #60714
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Disable SOD Pizza AOT Blazor test #60876
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update slngen and solution files #60871
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix wrong property use in resolveContract.targets #60868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Distinguish callsite and callee VM-no-inline failure messages #60661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Stop flagging methods with well-known unsupported types for conversion #60841
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Update compatibility package and unpin compiler version #60847
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Process: throw ArgumentNullException when ArgumentList contains a null. #59562
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Fix DGML debug tests for Regex NonBacktracking #60853
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Use preferred region from PAL for JIT reloc hints #60747
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use SDK-selected runtime in IL SDK #60400
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Up retry for ETXTBSY #60741
  • [DllImportGenerator] Skip unit tests that hit exceptions due to roslyn-sdk#590 #60848
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [metadata] Break up mono_metadata_parse_type_internal #60725
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Implement System.Array functions used by MD arrays as intrinsics #60816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor Regex FindFirstChar #60822
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix more alloc-dealloc mismatches #60691
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Explicitly emit a diagnostic for ref returns in GeneratedDllImport stubs. #60720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Remove some redundant threading tests, move some cases to libraries tests #59073
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Misc build improvements #60701
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] PInvokeTableGenerator: Fixup symbol names with invalid chars #60814
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change code generation strategy for ILEmitResolverBuilder #60831
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Fix LastWriteTime and LastAccessTime of a symlink on Windows and Unix #52639
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Properly type primary selectors in `fgMemoryVNForLoopSideEffects` #60505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Revise descriptions of VS workloads, and add missing ones #60835
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • POC src/tests tree test xunit-based source generated runner #60846
    area-Infrastructure
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Make memory mapped stress log work for child processes. #60828
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Prototype mark overflow fix for regions #60646
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build #60675
    community-contribution
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: "Scaled" addressing mode on ARM #60808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • ci test #59222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix update: add Ubuntu 21.04 - second attempt #60162
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI matrix: add openSUSE 15.2 - second attempt #60161
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Add support for "byref of any type" to the type system #60571
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add linux x86 build CI for pull request #60817
    * NO MERGE *, community-contribution
  • Setting nullable string properties from `Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel` #60842
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][EXPERIMENT] [wasm][aot] link with O1 #60739
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][jit] Add a micro optimization to fill_runtime_generic_context (). #60839
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • IFormatProvider getter refactor #60815
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Disable DllImportGenerator tests on s390x #60833
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, arch-s390x
  • Clean-up crossgen's NuGet dependencies et. al. #59914
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
